Klasse ThemeDAO_Serializable

java.lang.Object
persistence.DataAccessObject
persistence.serialization.dao.ThemeDAO_Serializable
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class ThemeDAO_Serializable extends DataAccessObject
Serializable Data Access Object (DAO) representing a quiz theme, used in the file-based serialization persistence implementation.

This DAO persists its data directly to disk using Java serialization. Stored data includes:

  • Theme title
  • Associated list of questions for the theme
  • Unique theme identifier
Files are stored in the ./quizData folder with a naming pattern: 
 Theme.{id}
where id is the unique identifier for the theme.
Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

  • Methodendetails

    • save

      public void save()
      Saves this ThemeDAO_Serializable instance to disk using Java serialization.

      If the theme has no ID assigned, a new one is generated automatically.

    • readById

      public static ThemeDAO_Serializable readById(int id)
      Reads a ThemeDAO_Serializable object from disk by its ID.
      Parameter:
      id - the unique theme ID
      Gibt zurück:
      the loaded ThemeDAO_Serializable instance, or null if read fails
